website_summaries.verdict: Small and light, you can hang it anywhere.
pros: This lantern is made from light aluminum-alloy and nickel-alloy materials, which ensures it is high-temperature and corrosion-resistant
It's especially bright for its size, and the lamp is shatterproof
cons: There is no stand that comes with this lantern
It's primary function is as a hanging propane lantern

customer_reviews.title: Buy this light
customer_reviews.text: If you camp, this is a must have. I am 100% satisfied with this light. It is bright, lightweight and 100% reliable. Works with the Butane, Butane Propane mix, and propane.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon1Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 months to junk
customer_reviews.text: I used his product a few nights in my home for bedside reading, once in the woods for the campsite, and then again one more time in my living room. After that, it had a hard time staying going (seemed like low fuel flow) and a day later, morning. It looks prefect and has always been taken well care of, never dropped, used only by me. It does not work after less than 10 used over 4 months. The return window is closed, so I’m left with a paperweight. Perhaps try a different option.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua N.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome value. Bought 3 more. Love it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. Gives off great light. It works great. Used it for a day when power went out. It doesn't give off too much heat but does get a little hot. But it's as bright as a living room light like a 100 watt bulb brightness.
customer_reviews.author: DonS

customer_reviews.title: I can honestly report that it is great! It is small and light weight
customer_reviews.text: I waited to do this review until after I'd had this lantern for a while, and could use it. I can honestly report that it is great! It is small and light weight. It puts out a good amount of light and is easy to light up. The mantle wasn't hard to get on and burn. Really, I have nothing bad to say. I was concerned about the glass globe, but it has been robust and has withstood rough treatment both backpacking and car camping. I couldn't imagine using the version with the metal glabe - it would severely limit the light output. This is cheap enough, and good enough that you won't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan B. MarshTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: buy coleman type 51 mantles
customer_reviews.text: As advertised. I gave it four stars because of no spare mantle and other reviewers claimed the one provided was crap. I'd like to thank those other reviewers who suggested using a coleman type 51 mantle. They work great and are obviously better quality. The lantern does not come with an instruction manual, contact info, or how to get replacement parts (like spare mantles) so the type 51 info was invaluable. Otherwise very bright and adjustable. It gets very hot so I'd be careful using it inside a tent. A little heavy for back packing (so buy your hiking buddy one and let him/her carry it). I plan to use it for canoe trips.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice while it lasted...
customer_reviews.text: It started out well, but only used it on one trip, and in that time, the glass MELTED and cracked from the heat. Bright light was great, but it also REALLY HEATED UP the gas canister. Also After its first use, the chain also weakened and would not trust it to support the lantern.....
customer_reviews.author: Real User

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: It gets incredibly bright and can be turned very low the mantle that was included was crap I went to Walmart and got a 2 pack of #21 coleman mantles for less than $5 they work perfectly I enjoy this better than the full size lantern it puts out the same amount of light and only takes up a 10th of the space which means it's lighter it cools faster and the electric ignition is a really nice feature.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: This is the mini lantern you've been looking for.
customer_reviews.text: Great compact single mantle lantern. Just bright enough. It does emit flames from the top when on high, but seems just right just below medium.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Balph

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool
customer_reviews.text: I like this little lantern, super bright for its size... I kinda wish it had a bail handle instead of the long chain though. I got the Kovea adapter and it also works fine on a 1lb propane bottle, just don't crank it wide open or it will flood it so to speak.
customer_reviews.author: Cain929

customer_reviews.title: Happy Camper
customer_reviews.text: This lantern is just like the big boys, very bright but compact. It does put off quite a bit of heat, you can warm up to. Being smaller it is some what fragile. You wouldn't want to toss it around. All in all a very good deal.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren A. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Gives out plenty of light
customer_reviews.text: I like that is really small but gives plenty of light
customer_reviews.author: Donald Lehman

customer_reviews.title: Love mine
customer_reviews.text: To be so tiny, this is a bright little light. Love it. It has its own case, a long chain to suspend it by, fold away flame adjuster and piezo starter. Magnificent lantern that perches nicely on an 8 oz butane canister. With an adapter, it may l use a 16 oz propane bottle also.
customer_reviews.author: C. Michael CollierTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: More than you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You can't go wrong at this price point. I think it is as good as the much pricier brand name ones. Mine is about as bright as a table lamp. I use an adaptor and cheap Asian grocery store butane. It's a winner.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Great little lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great little lantern, puts out a respectable amount of light considering its size. I use this in conjunction with a butane adapter so i can use those cheap bayonet butane cartridge you can find in asian grocery stores.
customer_reviews.author: Jinx

customer_reviews.title: Small & compact which is good..
customer_reviews.text: Gets too hot to hold the chain...which has only a 0 hoop at the end....no way to "grasp" it on anything. Small & compact which is good...no mention of which replacement mantels tho. Got Coleman 21 to foot, tho not ideal.
customer_reviews.author: gigster

customer_reviews.title: very bright, great value
customer_reviews.text: Extremely bright for its size, comparable to full size dual element propane mantle lanterns like Coleman. Comes with a red plastic case to leave it in during transport and a chain to hang it.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Very small, very bright, VERY HOT. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Very small, very bright, VERY HOT. I wish there was a hood/shade for it. Oh well. For this price, you can't go wrong. Includes a mantle and lil plastic carrying box.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Kosecki

customer_reviews.title: Bright, cheap, easy
customer_reviews.text: I love this, there's a built in lighter, it's quite bright, and there's a carry chain. The heat may cause the carry chain to fatigue and break (so only four stars).
customer_reviews.author: Drake A. Dwornik

customer_reviews.title: The best gas lantern i owned
customer_reviews.text: The best gas lantern i owned, its super compact but as bright as the bigger ones, the material used is solid and would last long. The best part is you can turn this super low and practically run it all night on small butane cylinder with some gas to spare.
customer_reviews.author: Sidd

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!!! Arrived on time. Great price. I am very happy with product.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Harris

customer_reviews.title: Nice and compact
customer_reviews.text: Nice and compact. Good light for the size. The base gets really hot though, much more than expected so not fun to remove from fuel can without a glove or waiting a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Bryngelson

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp
customer_reviews.text: Puts out a reasonable amount of light. I'll probably use this when car camping as I purchased an adaptor to use with 1 lb propane cylinders.
customer_reviews.author: Gumby

customer_reviews.title: Neat little lantern.
customer_reviews.text: Bit of a challenge to get the mantle set up correctly. Some instruction would be good.
customer_reviews.author: Eric V.

customer_reviews.title: No parts or support avaialable
customer_reviews.text: Arrived with broken glass globe. I cannot find a replacement part anywhere
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Clark

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Compact and works well. It gets hot so keep away from things that will melt or burn!
customer_reviews.author: AlexP

customer_reviews.title: This product is great, no need to bring two kinds of gas ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is great, no need to bring two kinds of gas anymore. Same amount of light output as a single mantel propane lantern but much lighter and more compact. This will be my go to backpacking lantern.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great little lantern!! Mantels could be better but still great.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Frix

customer_reviews.title: It's a fantastic value.
customer_reviews.text: It's a fantastic value. It was everything I wanted for a much lower price.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A. Kohn

customer_reviews.title: great lightweight lantern
customer_reviews.text: Great Lightweight Little Lantern Really Bright easily Replace Mantle With Store Bought Ones Too
customer_reviews.author: nick

customer_reviews.title: Good little light
customer_reviews.text: Good little light. But forget about the enclosed mantle go buy some good one and be done with it. Everything e
customer_reviews.author: Corey R.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little lantern
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little lantern. Small size is great. Gives off plenty of light. The mantle is junk, bought Coleman mantles.
customer_reviews.author: TM

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good little light. Goes with the rocket stove very well.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Starr

customer_reviews.title: might come in handy
customer_reviews.text: If you already have and are using propane bottles then this might come in handy. It's small but gives plenty of light. Seems rather delicate if knocked over, but then any mantle lamp is like that. Hot!
customer_reviews.author: Lars Mars

customer_reviews.title: Lantern is Amazing. I suggest everyone that considers this lantern to buy it, They won't regret it.
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical upon purchase of this little Lantern. I was pleasantly surprised. Works great lots of light and the size makes it ideal if your trying to watch you space when camping.
customer_reviews.author: A TBird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This little fellow is awesome! The equivalent of lighting a 10x10 room. super light weight! love it!
customer_reviews.author: Cesar

customer_reviews.title: Much better
customer_reviews.text: I said i would update and here it is Amazon did their part and did it well. docooler fixed there issues lantern is great thank you.
customer_reviews.author: G

product_meta.title: Docooler174; Mini Portable Camping Lantern Gas Light Tent Lamp Torch Hanging Glass Lamp Chimney Butane 80LUX
feature_bullets: ★​Adopts intensified light aluminum alloy and nickel alloy material, high-temperature resistant and corrosion-resistant.
★High-energy ceramic piezoelectric ignition system ensures a successful ignition.
★Intensified thin lamp chimney, shatterproof and high-temperature resistant.
★Well packed in a plastic box. A hanging chain included.
